answers.answer: The gestational diabetes  test is done at 6months
What do they do to check it?
They make u drink this colored non sugar or flavor drink and u have to keep it down for a half an hour or an hour and then they do blood tests but if u throw up the drink u got to reschedule
Its not always colored. It can be down as early as 20w but usually its done at 24w
I don't take mine until I'm 27 wks, I'm currently 24 + 3
I don't take mine until I'm 27 wks, I'm currently 24 + 3
I just did mine today and I'm 26+2

The test Is generally given between the 24th and 28th week of pregnancy. Regardless, you have to drink this really sugary drink, sometimes they'll have flavors for you to pick out, like Orange or Fruit Punch, sometimes they don't... Depends on your doctor or where you go I suppose. Then after you drink It (which you have a certain amount of time to drink It, I had 5 min.) , you can't eat anythin' and have to wait one hour and then get blood drawn.
